content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to Google "online communities or forums for language learning resource recommendations". The computer returned no new developments to report, but provided a list of websites that offer language learning resources. The list includes: https://www.alllanguageresources.com/, https://www.learningresources.com/, https://www.doe.mass.edu/instruction/curate/, https://languagelearningathome.com/blog/my-honest-review-of-duolingo-for-homeschool-language-learning, https://www.fluentin3months.com/reviews/babbel-review/, https://www.nysed.gov/curriculum-instruction/supporting-all-students-resource-guides-scaffolding-instruction-english, https://www.fluentin3months.com/reviews/lingq-review/, and https://www.louisianabelieves.com/academics/ONLINE-INSTRUCTIONAL-MATERIALS-REVIEWS. \n\nI executed a command to echo that I think it\'s a good idea to ask for recommendations from people who have used these resources before. However, the command returned a syntax error.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "online communities or forums for language learning resource recommendations"}}}'}]
"""
